duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance work on industrial equipment and machinery throughout the facility.
Troubleshoot PLC’s, PID loops, variable speed drives, low and medium voltage motor controls.
Maintain mechanical components and perform precision maintenance.
Fabricate parts and equipment as necessary.
Perform welding and cutting when required.
Inspect, audit and perform rigging task on sprinkler lines, poly tube lines, pro press fittings, pipe threading and pipe bending when necessary.
Understand and be able to troubleshoot ARC Flash procedures.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED Required
